unnormalised: Hey everyone, choosing a payment gateway can be a real Chakravyuh, like in Mahabharata! I remember when my cousin Priya started her saree business in Surat, she struggled with this.
normalised: Hey everyone, choosing a payment gateway can be a real Chakravyuh, like in Mahabharata! I remember when my cousin Priya started her saree business in Surat, she struggled with this.

unnormalised: Razorpay and PayU seem popular. Anyone used CCAvenue? Heard mixed reviews. UPI is a must-have now, right? We're so used to Google Pay after all. Need something reliable for those festive sales, Diwali is coming up fast!
normalised: R A Z O R P A Y and P A Y U seem popular. Anyone used C C Avenue? Heard mixed reviews. U P I is a must-have now, right? We're so used to Google Pay after all. Need something reliable for those festive sales, Diwali is coming up fast!
